definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: The arrival of Tévez could hasten the sale of Alan Smith, who has been made surplus to requirements.
sentences.chinese: 特維斯的到來將讓史密斯更可能離隊。

sentences.english: And if Robbie Keane departs, Harry Redknapp will hope to sign a striker, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果基恩離隊，哈里會想再籤一名前鋒。

sentences.english: The soldier absented himself without leave for three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 那個士兵未請假離隊3個星期。

sentences.english: Now they are after a first Olympic medal.
sentences.chinese: 如今他們離隊史上第一枚奧運金牌已經不遠了。

sentences.english: The soldier absented himself without leave for three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 那個士兵未請假離隊三個星期。
